settings.text:
All of our products are covered by a Limited Lifetime Warranty against manufacturing defects in materials and workmanship for the lifetime of the product.   If a product covered by this warranty fails due to a manufacturing defect in materials and workmanship we will repair the product, without charge, or replace it, at our discretion. This warranty does not cover damage caused by accident, improper care, negligence, normal wear and tear, or the natural breakdown of colors and materials over extended time and use. This warranty is available for products purchased on www.symplofficial.com or with proof of purchase from an authorized reseller. Only original, unaltered and unmodified items and workmanship are covered.  Damage not covered under warranty may be repaired for a reasonable rate and a fee will be charged for return shipping.  Please contact us in this situation at  hello@symplofficial.com

* This warranty does not cover surfing accessories *

settings.heading: How we move.
settings.text: We know how you live –– it’s the same way we do. Constant spontaneous adventures. There’s no reason to say no, to live life to the fullest you want to always say yes. This is why our gear is highly adaptable, allowing you to move freely through any environment. Our timeless designs allow you to fit in anywhere, while our durable materials keep your gear looking new. So, where are you going to go? You can be a part of our evolution by sharing your feedback and adventures. #wherenext

Our designs are informed by our experiences, pursuits, and travels, but have also launched to fanfare and reviews for our blend of innovative protective features and unique sustainable materials. Look us up and you’ll find a collection of press, from Hypebeast to the Hundreds talking about our use of these unique materials in interesting forms. Whether pioneering biodegradability in traction pads, eco-friendly performance in surf hardgoods, protective yet compacting design in gear bags, or the durability and protection in our latest range of Move Freely bags and accessories we are constantly refining, testing, and enjoying the process of making the best possible gear for you. So drop us a line, hit us up on facebook, or slide into our DMs. We are building a network based off loyalty and want to hear from you and how you are enjoying the sympl life. Together we can not only build a better future, but also better gear.

All of our products are covered by a Limited Lifetime Warranty against manufacturing defects in materials and workmanship for the lifetime of the product.  

If a product covered by this warranty fails due to a manufacturing defect in materials and workmanship we will repair the product, without charge, or replace it, at our discretion.

This warranty does not cover damage caused by accident, improper care, negligence, normal wear and tear, or the natural breakdown of colors and materials over extended time and use.

This warranty is available for products purchased on www.symplofficial.com or with proof of purchase from an authorized reseller. Only original, unaltered and unmodified items and workmanship are covered. 

Damage not covered under warranty may be repaired for a reasonable rate and a fee will be charged for return shipping.  Please contact us in this situation at  hello@symplofficial.com

settings.heading: If we protect the planet, it will protect us. It's sympl.
